seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 8+ years of experience in Data Engineering

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipeline creation and SQL/Python skills

sub_specialty.evidence: Snowflake Database is explicitly mentioned as a required skill, indicating a focus on data warehousing

leadership_expectation.evidence: No explicit or implied signals about leadership expectations (e.g., mentoring, code review, direct reports)

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers or services explicitly mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

secondary_clouds.evidence: No secondary clouds mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

processing_paradigm.evidence: Data pipeline creation is mentioned, but no explicit tools or terms related to streaming (e.g., Kafka, Flink, real-time) are present. SQL and Snowflake are typically associated with batch processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools or categories explicitly mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake Database is explicitly mentioned, which is a data warehouse solution

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as 'Cupertino, CA', which implies a regional restriction (Bay Area) unless remote work is explicitly allowed. No remote work model is mentioned, so defaulting to same_region

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

relocation_required.evidence: Job posting specifies location as 'Cupertino, CA' but does not mention relocation assistance or requirements. No evidence of relocation package or explicit relocation requirement

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of OPT/CPT support or student visa eligibility. Pass 1 extraction does not provide signals for OPT/CPT friendliness

citizenship_required.evidence: No discussion of work authorization, citizenship, or green card requirements in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Salary range is disclosed for a full-time role, and benefits are typically associated with W2 employment. No contract type mentioned, but inferred from context

benefits_level.evidence: Pass 1 extraction shows 'ext_benefits_mentioned' as an empty array, indicating no benefits were discussed

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit or implied signals about career growth paths or opportunities in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship, coaching, or working with senior engineers beyond the generic job description

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit or implied mention of promotion paths or advancement opportunities

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility, transfers, or role changes in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit or implied signals about available career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect)

requirement_strictness.evidence: Pass 1 extraction shows only 'must_have' skills with no 'nice_to_have' skills listed, indicating high strictness in requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on a single role (Senior Data Engineer) with well-defined responsibilities such as SQL, Python, and Snowflake

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements (8+ years, SQL, Python, Snowflake) align reasonably with the seniority level inferred from the title and experience
